What are the symptoms of Glass-Chapman-Hockley syndrome ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of Glass-Chapman-Hockley syndrome? Glass-Chapman-Hockley syndrome has only been described in one family with five affected family members in three generations. The signs and symptoms seen in the five affected family members varied, but included the following: Premature or early growing together or fusing of th
